creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of funds from The Northern Star Foundation and The Hersey Foundation
inscription: Signed, Dated, Numbered, Inscribed, Stamped, and Chop Mark
provenance: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis; sold to MIA, 1983.
signed:
LR: [N. SCOTT MOMADAY 1979]
LL: [AP 14/20]
UC: Now in the dawn before it dies, eagle swings / low and wide in a great arc, curving downward to / the place of origin. There is no wind, but there / is a long roaring on the air. It is like the / wind - nor is it quite like the / wind - but / more powerful. / N. Scott Momaday]
VERSO: [PRINTED AT VERMILLION EDITIONS LTD.]
title: Untitled
